title: DISCLAIMER

i

: Scaffolding is not recommended unless it’s for very conventional CRUD apps/testing. This may generate a lot of files(views/models/controllers) that are not needed in your web application thus causing headaches(bad :().

inline_content.Text: : Scaffolding is not recommended unless it’s for very conventional CRUD apps/testing. This may generate a lot of files(views/models/controllers) that are not needed in your web application thus causing headaches(bad :().

title: To generate a fully working scaffold for a new object, including model, controller, views, assets, and tests, use the
rails g scaffold
c
command.

rake db:migrate
c
